trans-unit.source: Register the current user for push notifications by using Web API | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Register the current user for push notifications by using Web API | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to request push notification registration in an iOS app with Azure Notification Hubs when registeration is performed by ASP.NET Web API.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to request push notification registration in an iOS app with Azure Notification Hubs when registeration is performed by ASP.NET Web API.

trans-unit.source: Register the current user for push notifications by using ASP.NET
trans-unit.target: Register the current user for push notifications by using ASP.NET

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Windows Store C
trans-unit.target: Windows Store C

trans-unit.source: iOS
trans-unit.target: iOS

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to request push notification registration with Azure Notification Hubs when registration is performed by ASP.NET Web API.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to request push notification registration with Azure Notification Hubs when registration is performed by ASP.NET Web API.

trans-unit.source: This topic extends the tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: This topic extends the tutorial [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: You must have already completed the required steps in that tutorial to create the authenticated mobile service.
trans-unit.target: You must have already completed the required steps in that tutorial to create the authenticated mobile service.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the notify users scenario, see [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: For more information on the notify users scenario, see [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: Update your app
trans-unit.target: Update your app

trans-unit.source: In your MainStoryboard_iPhone.storyboard, add the following components from the object library:
trans-unit.target: In your MainStoryboard_iPhone.storyboard, add the following components from the object library:

trans-unit.source: **Label**: "Push to User with Notification Hubs"
trans-unit.target: **Label**: "Push to User with Notification Hubs"

trans-unit.source: **Label**: "InstallationId"
trans-unit.target: **Label**: "InstallationId"

trans-unit.source: **Label**: "User"
trans-unit.target: **Label**: "User"

trans-unit.source: **Text Field**: "User"
trans-unit.target: **Text Field**: "User"

trans-unit.source: **Label**: "Password"
trans-unit.target: **Label**: "Password"

trans-unit.source: **Text Field**: "Password"
trans-unit.target: **Text Field**: "Password"

trans-unit.source: **Button**: "Login"
trans-unit.target: **Button**: "Login"

trans-unit.source: At this point, your storyboard looks like the following:
trans-unit.target: At this point, your storyboard looks like the following:

trans-unit.source: In the assistant editor, create outlets for all the switched controls and call them, connect the text fields with the View Controller (delegate), and create an **Action** for the **login** button.
trans-unit.target: In the assistant editor, create outlets for all the switched controls and call them, connect the text fields with the View Controller (delegate), and create an **Action** for the **login** button.

trans-unit.source: In PushToUserAppDelegate.h, add the following property singleton:
trans-unit.target: In PushToUserAppDelegate.h, add the following property singleton:

trans-unit.source: In the **didFinishLaunchingWithOptions** method in PushToUserAppDelegate.m, add the following code:
trans-unit.target: In the **didFinishLaunchingWithOptions** method in PushToUserAppDelegate.m, add the following code:

trans-unit.source: The first line initializes the **DeviceInfo** singleton.
trans-unit.target: The first line initializes the **DeviceInfo** singleton.

trans-unit.source: The second line starts the registration for push notifications, which is already present is you have already completed the [Get Started with Notification Hubs] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: The second line starts the registration for push notifications, which is already present is you have already completed the [Get Started with Notification Hubs] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: In PushToUserAppDelegate.m, implement the method **didRegisterForRemoteNotificationsWithDeviceToken** in your AppDelegate and add the following code:
trans-unit.target: In PushToUserAppDelegate.m, implement the method **didRegisterForRemoteNotificationsWithDeviceToken** in your AppDelegate and add the following code:

trans-unit.source: This sets the device token for the request.
trans-unit.target: This sets the device token for the request.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] At this point, there should not be any other code in this method.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] At this point, there should not be any other code in this method.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a call to the **registerNativeWithDeviceToken** method that was added when you completed the [Get Started with Notification Hubs](/manage/services/notification-hubs/get-started-notification-hubs-ios/%20target="_blank") tutorial, you must comment-out or remove that call.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a call to the **registerNativeWithDeviceToken** method that was added when you completed the [Get Started with Notification Hubs](/manage/services/notification-hubs/get-started-notification-hubs-ios/%20target="_blank") tutorial, you must comment-out or remove that call.

trans-unit.target: This method displays an alert in the UI when your app receives notifications while it is running.

trans-unit.target: Open the PushToUserViewController.m file, and return the keyboard in the following implementation:

trans-unit.target: In the **viewDidLoad** method in the PushToUserViewController.m file, initialize the installationId label as follows:

trans-unit.source: Then, add the following implementation:
trans-unit.target: Then, add the following implementation:

trans-unit.source: Copy the following code into the **login** handler method created by XCode:
trans-unit.target: Copy the following code into the **login** handler method created by XCode:

trans-unit.source: This method gets both an installation ID and channel for push notifications and sends it, along with the device type, to the authenticated Web API method that creates a registration in Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: This method gets both an installation ID and channel for push notifications and sends it, along with the device type, to the authenticated Web API method that creates a registration in Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: This Web API was defined in [Notify users with Notification Hubs].
trans-unit.target: This Web API was defined in [Notify users with Notification Hubs].

trans-unit.source: Now that the client app has been updated, return to the [Notify users with Notification Hubs] and update the mobile service to send notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target: Now that the client app has been updated, return to the [Notify users with Notification Hubs] and update the mobile service to send notifications by using Notification Hubs.
